item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 24, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Shortest-possible walking tour to 81,998 bars in South Korea (310 points | 86 comments)
2. "Careless People" the book that Meta tried to suppress (103 points | 6 comments)
3. Show HN: My from-scratch OS kernel that runs DOOM (211 points | 46 comments)
4. How a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in Windows 11 24H2 (1143 points | 261 comments)
5. Vim Language, Motions, and Modes Explained (13 points | 4 comments)
6. You wouldn't steal a font (995 points | 307 comments)
7. YAGRI: You are gonna read it (209 points | 102 comments)
8. CubeCL: GPU Kernels in Rust for CUDA, ROCm, and WGPU (145 points | 18 comments)
9. Launch HN: Cua (YC X25) – Open-Source Docker Container for Computer-Use Agents (136 points | 52 comments)
10. I Tried to Buy an Actual Barrel of Crude Oil (2015) (82 points | 21 comments)
11. Teaching LLMs how to solid model (255 points | 87 comments)
12. AI Horseless Carriages (618 points | 395 comments)
13. Graphics livecoding in Common Lisp (166 points | 36 comments)
14. AMD Publishes Open-Source Driver for GPU Virtualization, Radeon "In the Roadmap" (46 points | 11 comments)
15. The hidden cost of AI coding (117 points | 183 comments)
16. First Successful Lightning Triggering and Guiding Using a Drone (127 points | 57 comments)
17. The Race That Turned to Ruin (6 points | discuss)
18. Show HN: Node.js video tutorials where you can edit and run the code (215 points | 76 comments)
19. The Future of MCPs (149 points | 65 comments)
20. Sail-Trim Simulator (119 points | 22 comments)
21. Clinical trial: novel nutritional formula treats gut microbial overgrowth (39 points | 16 comments)
22. Google blocked Motorola use of Perplexity AI, witness says (171 points | 104 comments)
23. Finland is painting deer antlers with reflective paint (2014) (59 points | 74 comments)
24. MCP on AWS Lambda with MCPEngine (87 points | 9 comments)
25. Sustain your creative drive in the face of technological change (120 points | 11 comments)
26. Dissecting a British wartime night vision tank periscope [video] (21 points | 1 comment)
27. My experience of participating to a startup weekend competition in Italy (47 points | 30 comments)
28. Reptends and Reciprocals (9 points | discuss)
29. DOGE worker’s code supports NLRB whistleblower (845 points | 457 comments)
30. Beer on Board in the Age of Sail (2017) (53 points | 55 comments)
